select a.id,a.name,u.name as owner,a.type,a.source,a.stage,c.name as customerId,t.fullname as contactsId from tbl_tran a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id join tbl_customer c on a.customerId=c.id join tbl_contacts t on a.contactsId=t.id
a.name like '%' #{name} '%'

select a.id,a.name,u.name as owner,a.type,a.source,a.stage,c.name as customerId,t.fullname as contactsId,a.money,a.expectedDate,a.createBy, a.createTime,a.editBy,a.editTime,a.description,a.contactSummary,a.nextContactTime,act.name as activityId from tbl_tran a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id join tbl_customer c on a.customerId=c.id left join tbl_activity act on a.activityId=act.id left join tbl_contacts t on a.contactsId=t.id where a.id=#{id}
